# FASCN.FromCertificate method

Initializes a new instance of the [`FASCN`](../FASCNType) class from an X.509 certificate.

```csharp
public static FASCN FromCertificate(X509Certificate2 cert)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| cert | The X.509 certificate. |

## Return Value

A new instance of the [`FASCN`](../FASCNType) class.
